scripts.package: sam validate && sam package --profile personal --template-file template.yaml --output-template-file packaged-template.yaml --s3-bucket hasanganitestbuckets3
scripts.deploy: sam deploy --profile personal --template-file packaged-template.yaml --stack-name biscuits-stack --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.build: npm install && mkdir dist && npx webpack --watch
scripts.s3Upload: aws s3 cp --profile personal config.js s3://hasanganitestbuckets3/js/config.js
